summary: This document is an email chain from September 1, 2020, forwarding a draft of press remarks for Ghislaine Maxwell. The chain includes edits and feedback from Audrey Strauss, the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York, and other individuals, focusing on tightening the language and ensuring it comports with the indictment.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is a draft of press remarks concerning her, with edits being coordinated by the U.S. Attorney's Office.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: She is editing and providing feedback on the draft press remarks for Ghislaine Maxwell, ensuring the language is natural and comports with the indictment.

connections.description: Strauss, as Acting U.S. Attorney, is overseeing the preparation of official press remarks regarding Maxwell's case.

events.title: Editing of GM Press Remarks
events.description: Multiple individuals, including Audrey Strauss, provide edits and feedback on a draft of press remarks concerning Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Final Version Forwarded
events.description: An email forwards what is believed to be the last version of the Ghislaine Maxwell press remarks.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was preparing official press remarks regarding Ghislaine Maxwell in July 2020.
Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss was personally involved in editing the remarks to ensure they were tight, natural, and comported with the indictment.
The document shows internal coordination and legal review of public statements related to a high-profile case.
